attributes.action: Improve the security of this site to prevent fraudulent signatures.
attributes.additional_details:
Removing signatures and discrediting petitions after the event is not a satisfactory solution. In fact, this only serves to undermine the credibility of this site and all the petitions people have created here.

I suggest one of the following solutions;

1) Make the site secure so that this situation does not happen again,
Or
2) Remove the site. If the signatures cannot be trusted, then petitions are worthless.
attributes.background: The petition "EU Referendum Rules triggering a 2nd EU Referendum" has reached 3,952,097 signatures as I write this. However, it seems likely that it is going to be dismissed due to claims of false signatures added by automated bots,  foreign nationals etc.

rejection.details: We're not sure what specific measures you would like to be put in place.  You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like us to do.
